name: Cavern of Riches
overview: Adventure 1: Cavern of Riches is a typical text adventure game in which the player must try to collect the twelve different treasures hidden in the game world. They must be returned to their proper place. The player can move around in all directions and can pick-up and manipulate items. Simple puzzles must be solved, but there is little to no story. The game does feature a save and load system to restore from an earlier game.
